#!/usr/bin/python

import sys


def main():
    data = sys.stdin
    nb = int(data.readline())
    for icase in xrange(nb):
        guests = int(data.readline())
        arrivals = map(int, data.readline().split())
        departures = map(int, data.readline().split())
        actual_customers = 0
        max_actual_customers = 0
        while True:
            # find min value
            if len(arrivals) > 0:
                min_a, min_d = min(arrivals), min(departures)
                if min_a < min_d:
                    actual_customers += 1
                    arrivals.remove(min_a)
                elif min_d < min_a:
                    actual_customers -= 1
                    departures.remove(min_d)
                else: # means equal
                    arrivals.remove(min_a)
                    departures.remove(min_d)
                if actual_customers > max_actual_customers:
                    max_actual_customers = actual_customers
            else:
                # no more arrivals, stop the loop
                break
        print max_actual_customers



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
